show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
If you come upon the unconscious victim of a car wreck who suddenly awakens in a panic, what should you do? If you’re sitting beside a loved one or patient coming out of anesthesia and he or she becomes violent… or if your friend, parishioner or patient threatens suicide… how should you respond?
What can any of us do if someone we care about starts acting very disturbed or “crazy” in our presence?
My guest Doug Bower is well-qualified to talk about this with me.
He’s a PhD counselor, an ordained Methodist minister and a registered nurse.
We focus on how to handle emergencies without resort to psychiatric drugs.
